title: r/AmITheA**hole For Becoming a Super Karen To Yell At My Kid's Teacher?
description: r/AmITheA**hole When a mother yells at a worker, does that automatically make her a Karen? In today's episode, OP gets in trouble at school for a completely bogus reason, so her mom comes to the school to yell at the teachers for being so stupid and backwards with their rules. Is this an instance where being a Karen is justified? If you like this episode, follow for more daily Reddit content!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
